short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable comments on any web page. You can share thoughts anywhere with others with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enable comments on any web page. You can share thoughts anywhere with others with this extension.

Have you had some experience that you want to leave comments on websites that doesn't have comments feature? You might have stumbled on a website that covers difficult topics and you might wanted to ask some question. Or you might have encountered a very interesting website that you want to interact with other users.

In any case, Anywhere comment extension gives you power to use comment feature on every website. If you press the extension icon, it shows a small popup where you can view, register and update comment on the current website. Extension icon have a small label that indicates the count of comments on the website.

Any feedback are welcome. Thank you!
